title: The Gem Process (Irreducible Singularity)
description: The foundational principle of the singular thread of attention between user and agent.

principles.singularity: The interaction constitutes a single, continuous thread of execution. This is the driver for all system complexity.
principles.constraint: Single-Threaded Substrate: The agent cannot modify its own foundational parameters (model, memory limits) while running.
principles.protocol: Explicit Stops for Meta-Maintenance: Multi-stage workflows must yield control to the user for meta-tasks like model switching.
